statuses.name: MSG_ERR_INVALID_ARG
statuses.title: Bad request arguments
statuses.body: Invalid arguments were passed to the system

statuses.name: Bad request domain
statuses.title: Extension error
statuses.body: Invalid domain was passed to the system

statuses.name: MSG_ERR_NO_POLICY_FOUND
statuses.title: Policy not found
statuses.body: No privacy policy for this domain was found in our database

statuses.name: MSG_ERR_INVALID_RESULT
statuses.title: Policy can't be summarized
statuses.body: Our system couldn't produce a valid summary for the privacy policy
